   16: 
   17: -module(cluster_commands_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -import(distributed_helper, [add_node_to_cluster/1,
   21:                              remove_node_from_cluster/1,
   22:                              is_sm_distributed/0]).
   23: -import(ejabberdctl_helper, [ejabberdctl/3, rpc_call/3]).
   24: 
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [{group, clustered},
   34:      {group, ejabberdctl}].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{clustered, [], [one_to_one_message]},
   38:      {ejabberdctl, [], [set_master_test]}].
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Init & teardown
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: 
   47: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config),
   49: 
   50:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
   51:     Config2 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Node, Config1),
   52:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Node, Config2),
   53:     MainDomain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   54:     Ch = [{hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(MainDomain) ++ "\"]"}],
   55:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(Node, "reltool_vars/node2_vars.config", Ch, Config2),
   56:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(Node, reload_local, Config2),
   57:     {ok, EjdWD} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(file, get_cwd, []),
   58:     CtlPath = case filelib:is_file(EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl") of
   59:                   true -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl";
   60:                   false -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/mongooseimctl"
   61:               end,
   62:     escalus:init_per_suite([{ctl_path, CtlPath} | Config2]).
   63: 
   64: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   65:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
   66:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Node, Config),
   67:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(Node, ejabberd),
   68:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
   71: 
   72:     Config1 = add_node_to_cluster(Config),
   73: 
   74:     case is_sm_distributed() of
   75:         true ->
   76:             escalus:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice, clusterguy]});
   77:         {false, Backend} ->
   78:             ct:pal("Backend ~p doesn't support distributed tests", [Backend]),
   79:             remove_node_from_cluster(Config1),
   80:             {skip, nondistributed_sm}
   81:     end;
   82: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   83:     escalus:create_users(Config).
   84: 
   85: end_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == clustered orelse Group == ejabberdctl ->
   86:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, clusterguy]}),
   87:     remove_node_from_cluster(Config);
   88: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   89:     escalus:delete_users(Config).
   90: 
   91: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   92:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   93: 
   94: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   95:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   96: 
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: %% Message tests
   99: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  100: 
  101: one_to_one_message(ConfigIn) ->
  102:     %% Given Alice connected to node one and ClusterGuy connected to node two
  103:     Metrics = [{[data, dist], [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}],
  104:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, Metrics} | ConfigIn],
  105:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {clusterguy, 1}], fun(Alice, ClusterGuy) ->
  106:                 %% When Alice sends a message to ClusterGuy
  107:                 Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ClusterGuy, <<"Hi!">>),
  108:                 escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  109:                 %% Then he receives it
  110:                 Stanza1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy, 5000),
  111:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Stanza1),
  112: 
  113:                 %% When ClusterGuy sends a response
  114:                 Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  115:                 escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Msg2),
  116:                 %% Then Alice also receives it
  117:                 Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  118:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Stanza2)
  119:         end).
  120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  121: %% Ejabberdctl tests
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: 
  124: set_master_test(ConfigIn) ->
  125:     TableName = passwd,
  126:     NodeList = nodes(),
  127:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  128:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  129:     true = lists:member(MasterNode, NodeList),
  130:     RestNodesList = lists:delete(MasterNode, NodeList),
  131:     OtherNode = hd(RestNodesList),
  132:     ejabberdctl("set_master", [atom_to_list(OtherNode)], ConfigIn),
  133:     [OtherNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]),
  134:     ejabberdctl("set_master", ["self"], ConfigIn),
  135:     [MasterNode] = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, master_nodes]).
  136:
